attributes.action:
Do your jobs or your fired!
Invoke article 50. Replace Cameron NOW!
attributes.background:
Now that the Brexit result was to leave, it's time to invoke article 50.
Six founding member states demanded the earliest possible start to the process. 
We have the power to hire/fire our government and we won't sit by while it dawdles about its duties.
Suggest 1 month from now to complete.
